comment: Don't reinvent the wheel! Use a good framework.
Just have a good time and make what feels right!
Use smart naming conventions! It will save you many headaches in the end.
They will make your code more readable for other coders.
It really helps a lot with user accessibility.
It's just good to be thorough so everything isn't just a bunch of generic divs!
It's got the coolest name in my opinion.
